message_guardianGivesXPercentageToDelega: This Guardian gives {{percentage}} of the rewards to the Delegators
message_onlyCommitteeMembersAreEntitledT: only committee members and their delegators are entitled to rewards
message_participationExplanation: During the last {{daysPeriod}} days this guardian was part of the committee for {{timePercentage}}% of the time.
message_participationRewardsWarning: Guardians and their Delegators are entitled to rewards only for the time period in which the guardian is part of the committee.
